did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc:
Pamphlets, certificates, reports,
and other documents.
did.repository:
Division of Rare and Manuscript
Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
Valuation, appraisal and audit reports,
certificates and summaries of William H. Babcock and Sons, Inc., 1924-1936.
Also, Babcock's files of the Santa Monica, California and Bunker Hill, Los
Angeles Redevelopment Projects; and material concerning mass transportation,
primarily in Los Angeles.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p:
A real estate appraiser and engineer, and a former partner of William
H. Babcock and Sons, Real Estate Consultants and Valuators of Chicago, Babcock
also taught finance courses at the University of Southern California and UCLA.
He was involved in several studies of urban transportation problems and mass
transit development, primarily in Los Angeles, California. Member,
International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, Los Angeles Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p:
Valuation, appraisal and audit reports, certificates and summaries of
William H. Babcock and Sons, Inc., 1924-1936. Also, Babcock's files of the
Santa Monica, California and Bunker Hill, Los Angeles Redevelopment Projects;
material concerning mass transportation, primarily in Los Angeles; pamphlets
and reports.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname:
Lambda Alpha International. Los
Angeles Chapter.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p:
Henry Andrews Babcock Papers, #3022. Division of Rare and Manuscript
Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIAL
relatedmaterial.p: Part of the Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.
